trans-unit.source: Represents the possible values for a top-level node on a foreign machine.
trans-unit.target: 表示外部计算机上的顶级节点的可能值。

trans-unit.source: `RegistryHive` values are used by the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey%2A> method to represent the top-level node of a requested key on a foreign (remote) machine.
trans-unit.target: `RegistryHive` 通过使用值<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey%2A>方法用来表示外 （远程） 计算机上请求的键的顶级节点。

trans-unit.source: The node that can be opened with the OpenRemoteBaseKey method must be one of these top-level `RegistryKeys`.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 OpenRemoteBaseKey 方法打开的节点必须是这些顶级之一`RegistryKeys`。

trans-unit.source: Further access to the subkeys of the identified node is available using using methods in <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>, so long as the user has appropriate permission.
trans-unit.target: 对所标识节点的子项的进一步访问就可以使用中的方法<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>，只要用户具有适当权限。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to open a registry key on a remote computer and enumerate the values of the key.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何打开远程计算机上的注册表项和枚举的键的值。

trans-unit.source: The remote computer must be running the remote registry service.
trans-unit.target: 远程计算机必须运行远程注册表服务。

trans-unit.source: Specify the name of the remote computer as a command-line argument when invoking the program.
trans-unit.target: 调用该程序时，远程计算机的名称指定为命令行参数。

trans-unit.source: Represents the HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT base key on another computer.
trans-unit.target: 表示另一个计算机上的 HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT 基项。

trans-unit.source: This value can be passed to the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive,System.String)" /> method, to open this node remotely.
trans-unit.target: 此值可传递给 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive,System.String)" /> 方法，以远程打开此节点。

trans-unit.source: Represents the HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG base key on another computer.
trans-unit.target: 表示另一个计算机上的 HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG 基项。

trans-unit.source: This value can be passed to the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive,System.String)" /> method, to open this node remotely.
trans-unit.target: 此值可传递给 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive,System.String)" /> 方法，以远程打开此节点。

trans-unit.source: Represents the HKEY_CURRENT_USER base key on another computer.
trans-unit.target: 表示另一个计算机上的 HKEY_CURRENT_USER 基项。

trans-unit.source: This value can be passed to the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive,System.String)" /> method, to open this node remotely.
trans-unit.target: 此值可传递给 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive,System.String)" /> 方法，以远程打开此节点。

trans-unit.source: Represents the HKEY_DYN_DATA base key on another computer.
trans-unit.target: 表示另一个计算机上的 HKEY_DYN_DATA 基项。

trans-unit.source: This value can be passed to the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive,System.String)" /> method, to open this node remotely.
trans-unit.target: 此值可传递给 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive,System.String)" /> 方法，以远程打开此节点。

trans-unit.source: Represents the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE base key on another computer.
trans-unit.target: 表示另一个计算机上的 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE 基项。

trans-unit.source: This value can be passed to the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive,System.String)" /> method, to open this node remotely.
trans-unit.target: 此值可传递给 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive,System.String)" /> 方法，以远程打开此节点。

trans-unit.source: Represents the HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA base key on another computer.
trans-unit.target: 表示另一个计算机上的 HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA 基项。

trans-unit.source: This value can be passed to the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive,System.String)" /> method, to open this node remotely.
trans-unit.target: 此值可传递给 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive,System.String)" /> 方法，以远程打开此节点。

trans-unit.source: Represents the HKEY_USERS base key on another computer.
trans-unit.target: 表示另一个计算机上的 HKEY_USERS 基项。

trans-unit.source: This value can be passed to the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive,System.String)" /> method, to open this node remotely.
trans-unit.target: 此值可传递给 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive,System.String)" /> 方法，以远程打开此节点。
